articles.content: MENLO PARK, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Lightspeed Venture Partners (Lightspeed) today announced the closing of Lightspeed Venture Partners XIV-A/B, L.P. (Fund XIV) with $1.98 billion, Lightspeed Ventur… [+13407 chars]
